name: What Is Up?
description:
Use WASD and mouse to explore!
All interactions are automatic, you don't have to push or click anything,  simply walk around and the story will unfold.

(Note: Some of the doors are bugging right now, if you can't interact with them, just step away and walk up to them again.)

Story by Matt and Justin Wood
Level design by Justin Wood
Voice, Music, Sound Design, Programming by Matt Wood

Software: Unity, FMOD

3D assets by Synty Studios:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/polygon-pirates-l...
